casebody.data:
THE COOLERATOR COMPANY, a Division of International Telephone and Telegraph Corporation, a Maryland Corporation, et al. v. GLENN EARL, Inc., a Corporation. No. 4984. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Sept. 16, 1954. D. A. Skeen and Allen M. Swan, Salt Lake City, Utah, for appellants. Nielson & Conder, Salt Lake City, Utah, for appellee.

Before HUXMAN, MURRAH and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Reversed and remanded without written opinion.
